name: btgen
description: The web development boilerplate CLI generator tool.

scripts.test:webpage: node index.js webpage test && cd test && http-server -c-1 -d -i .
scripts.test:bootstrap: node index.js bootstrap test && cd test && http-server -c-1 -d -i .
scripts.test:webgame: node index.js webgame test && cd test && http-server -c-1 -d -i .
scripts.test:vuepage: node index.js vuepage test && cd test && http-server -c-1 -d -i .
scripts.test:reactpage: node index.js reactpage test && cd test && http-server -c-1 -d -i .
scripts.test:expressapp: node index.js expressapp test & cd test &&  http-server -c-1 -d - .t

author: kenliten
